topic.title: Prior Pregnancy History Section - conformance rules

lines.i: The pregnancy history section contains entries describing the patient's prior pregancy history.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.12"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCSECT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:368)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:370)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:369)/@code="57073-9" Prenatal events (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:515)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:371)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:372)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Date of Last Live Birth (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.20)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:373)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Last Menstrual Period Date (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.33)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:374)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Number of Births Now Living (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.36)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:375)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Number of Live Births Now Dead (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.38)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:376)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Other Pregnancy Outcome (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.40)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:377)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Estimate of Gestation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.21)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCSECT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:368)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:370)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:369)/@code="57073-9" Prenatal events (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:515)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:371)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:372)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Date of Last Live Birth (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.20)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:373)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Last Menstrual Period Date (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.33)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:374)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Number of Births Now Living (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.36)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:375)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Number of Live Births Now Dead (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.38)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:376)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Other Pregnancy Outcome (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.40)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:377)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Estimate of Gestation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.21)
